title: Crypcie
author: Crypcie
content: Welcome to the Crypcie exchange service!A little bit of our history:Several years ago we started our life in crypto industry as offline exchange service in such countries as Spain, Poland, Germany. Gradually gaining experience in this area, we expanded our geography and started working online.At present, the service Crypcie provides users with the ability to make exchanges of many cryptocurrencies regardless of their geography.The key principles of the company are:Â Honesty, Security, Speed, Customer Centricity.For more information you can contact us via:Web:Â crypcie.comTelegram:Â @crypcieInstagram:Â @crypcie.exchange

comments.author: Crypcie
comments.body: Happy to announce that our service Crypcie has been added to Pro-obmen monitoring.

comments.author: Crypcie
comments.body: We are glad to announce that along with Bitcoin, Tether USDT, Monero, Ethereum, BUSD, Litecoin, USDC, a new currency - TRX Tron - is now available for exchange on our cryptocurrency exchange service Crypcie.Also in addition to E-mon, Glazok.org, Wellcrypto.io, bit-pro.org, pro-obmen, Multirates.org, Monetory.io, scanmoney.net and allchange.org monitorings, Crypcie exchange was added to new monitoring platform - finector.io!

comments.author: Pingrapole
comments.body: Everyone likes new inventions Thanks for something new.Welcome to Crypcie .New currency means joy and if it's Bitcoin then more joy so nothing but joy to say here.

comments.author: Crypcie
comments.body: We are glad to announce that Crypcie cryptocurrency exchange service has been added to Bestchange monitoring!Â BestChange is a popular online service that helps you find exchangers with the most favorable exchange rates.Now the exchange directions of our Crypcie service are translated on BestChange, which allows monitoring visitors to go to crypcie.com and exchange cryptocurrency at a favorable rate.We will be very grateful for comments to our service on the BestChange monitoring page.

comments.author: Crypcie
comments.body: We are glad to announce that on our service Crypcie new directions of cryptocurrencies are available, namely the exchange of one coin for another, for example BTCâ‡„USDT, BTCâ‡„USDC, USDCâ‡„USDT, ETHâ‡„USDT, ETHâ‡„USDC, TRXâ‡„USDT, LTCâ‡„USDT, LTCâ‡„USDC, XMRâ‡„USDT, XMRâ‡„USDC, BTCâ‡„ETH, XRPâ‡„USDT, BNBâ‡„USDT and others.We look forward to seeing you on our service!

comments.author: Crypcie
comments.body: We are happy to announce that our Crypcie exchange service has been added to Blockchair Awesome!Blockchair is popular blockchain search and analytics engine for many cryptocurrencies, and Blockchair Awesome is the resource to find and compare crypto products and services, which are Blockchair partners. Now our service is presented in The Blockchair Awesome List as well.

comments.author: Crypcie
comments.body: We are happy to announce that our Crypcie exchange service has been added to scanbit monitoring!You can find us at the link https://scanbit.com.ua/ua/exchangers/crypcie/

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Is this an exchange service? If so, then it doesn't belong to this section because this is Off-topic, we've got a dedicated section for exchanges.And that's the actual Exchanges section --> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=223.0I would advise you to move this thread there and be part of the other exchanges that are posted there as their official announcement thread.

comments.body: We are pleased to announce that our exchange service Crypcie has become a partner of the service kurs.com.ua
